history.proof: intros Phi Hmax_consistent x y. split. - intros HPhi_x_and_y. split. + hecrush use: @DCS_andp_iff, @maximal_consistent_derivable_closed. + hecrush use: @DCS_andp_iff, @maximal_consistent_derivable_closed. - hecrush use: @DCS_andp_iff, @maximal_consistent_derivable_closed.

original: intros Phi Hmax_consistent x y. split. - intros HPhi_x_and_y. split. + apply (proj1 (maximal_consistent_spec _ Hmax_consistent) HPhi_x_and_y). + apply (proj1 (maximal_consistent_spec _ Hmax_consistent) HPhi_x_and_y). - intros [HPhi_x HPhi_y]. apply (proj2 (maximal_consistent_spec _ Hmax_consistent)). split. + apply HPhi_x. + apply HPhi_y.
